meanings.definition: A simple dance or song with repetitive movements.
meanings.sent1: During the school event, we all did the hokeypokey together.
meanings.sent2: At the party, the children giggled while doing the hokeypokey.
meanings.sent3: The clown's hokeypokey performance made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her hokeypokey moves were as precise as a clock ticking.
meanings.sent5: The hokeypokey dance was so catchy, it stayed in my head all day.

meanings.sent1: I don't have time for your hokeypokey, just tell me the truth.
meanings.sent2: His explanation was full of hokeypokey that no one believed him.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's hokeypokey jokes had the audience roaring with laughter.
meanings.sent4: Trying to convince me with that hokeypokey is like selling sand in the desert.
meanings.sent5: Don't listen to his hokeypokey, focus on what's real and important.

meanings.definition: A type of ice cream flavor.
meanings.sent1: I'll have a scoop of hokeypokey ice cream, please.
meanings.sent2: The kids were excited to try the new hokeypokey flavor at the ice cream shop.
meanings.sent3: The hokeypokey ice cream was so delicious, it disappeared in minutes.
meanings.sent4: The hokeypokey flavor was a sweet surprise in the midst of other choices.
meanings.sent5: The creamy hokeypokey ice cream melted in my mouth, leaving a delightful taste.
